DOC.brief_summary: Surgery play important role treatment anterior mediastinum disease . The major surgical approach include : cervical approach , mid-sternal approach , cervical combine mid-sternal approach video-assisted thoracoscopic approach . The cervical approach rarely adopt restricted visual field . The cervical combine mid-sternal approach broad field vision , give advantage , surgeon remove thymus surround fat tissue thoroughly . But trauma approach much large , postoperative complication also serious problem . The video-assisted thoracoscope often adopt leave right approach , minimally invasive procedure remove anterior mediastinum fat thoroughly . In clinical practice , investigator design new method name `` 3-Hole '' subxiphoid approach . This study design compare safety validity new method others .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Efficacy `` 3-Hole '' Subxiphorid Approach Treatment Anterior Mediastinal Tumor
